website_summaries.verdict: A lower priced floating hammock that is designed to be used in a number of different configurations so you can enjoy your relaxation in a variety of positions.
pros: This versatile hammock can be used for laying down, sitting, straddling, or hanging onto with your arms
It is an affordable unit which can support up to 250 pounds
Transport and storage is effortless because it simply deflates and rolls up
cons: The heavier fabric used in the manufacturing helps with durability, but some may find it less comfortable than flimsier models

customer_reviews.title: Light and great for travel and most of all sexy for the picture and gopro videos!!!
customer_reviews.text: Please see picture for proof!!! The quality is great... There's a chemical smell into it but that's not surprising... It works 4 in 1 really!!! I bought 2 to DR and no regrets at all!! Other reviews have issues putting air... it looks like it's complicated but this thing would work even if it's not fully blown... and when i tried it in the water, it actually works!!! If useful, please help a sister by clicking "helpful" :)
customer_reviews.author: Tranceformer

customer_reviews.title: If I could rate this a 10, I would!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ok... I did my research and believed the many that swore to this raft for travels. I am here to add an exclamation point to all of the positive reviews about this amazing raft. I will, also, humble myself (and throw my hubby under the bus) by posting pictures as proof. Neither of us are bathing beauties, but YES!!! These brilliant rafts even held us up. I’m 5’10” and weigh more than 150. My hubby is 6’2” and... hmmm... weighs more than me. ;) Don’t think about it any longer. Hit the ‘purchase’ button NOW!
customer_reviews.author: Geenza

customer_reviews.title: It was fun until it ripped.
customer_reviews.text: It worked really well for about a month. We used it maybe 6 times during this time. Both of my kids were laying on it when it ripped from the middle. As they tried to get off it fully opened.
customer_reviews.author: Nestor F. Estrada

customer_reviews.title: Not At All What I Expected!
customer_reviews.text: The photo shows a lady using it as a lounger. But the way it’s designed, it sends your bottom down, feet up in a V shape. Totally not comfortable! They also show a picture of using it as a floating chair, but the way the netting is attached, that's not possible. It's too bad because construction-wise it's one of the best-built chairs from a durability perspective. Can't use it for what they claim you can. 1 Star is generous.
customer_reviews.author: frankc

customer_reviews.title: My favorite float!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite float for my new pool! I wanted a chair like float to sit in and this is exactly what I wanted. my daughter even fell asleep sitting in my lap while I was floating on this hammock. if you're looking for something to sit in the pool this is the best. I'm ordering another one for vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: These are terrible! Received them quickly
customer_reviews.text: These are terrible! Received them quickly, however they do not stay aired up. Could not find a hole but still does not stay blown up and as you can see in the photo are very lumpy
customer_reviews.author: Terri Lavender

customer_reviews.title: Knockoff - Fraudulent - Misleading
customer_reviews.text: I would give this zero stars if I could. I ordered the deluxe hammock in July and it is amazing. Canvas material, sturdy mesh, handles, bag. It's perfect. So perfect, I came back in August to buy another. What I received on the EXACT same order was the equivalent of a piece of plastic. It came in a clear plastic wrap, not the same packaging as the name brand. It was the same print, but was terrible odorous plastic material, with a terrible mesh. No handles. No bag. I am appalled at this level of bait and switch and fraud for this knockoff. You can see the knockoff versus the actual product in my photos.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole DeMo

customer_reviews.title: PRODUCT RECEIVED IS NOT WHAT IS ADVERTISED!!!
customer_reviews.text: Product is not Aqua brand as advertised! Nowhere on the packing does it reflect the brand, nor does it come in a box like it shows. Additionally many of the reviews show the actual product advertised which is incredibly miss leading and just goes to show they are not legitimate reviews. Very disappointed I wasted my money and that Amazon continues to allow people to do business this way on their site! I only gave one star because it forced me to select one. I actually give it 0! DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Melton

customer_reviews.title: Leak at stitches where it was put together
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my vacation and when I got to my destinations and blew it up there was a whole or leak in one of them. So I could not use it. The leak was right at the seam where the stitches are. Please check right away so you can return yours when you find out it has a leak as I cannot return mine now. Huge waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: theresa

customer_reviews.title: These popped disappointingly quickly
customer_reviews.text: I have these in four colors--navy, aqua, orange, and pink. The navy and aqua ones look brand new, but the other two have lost their color significantly. I mean they're almost solid white now. I loooooove the style of these floats because they're comfortable and versatile, and they're much easier to get on and off of. Unfortunately, they haven't proven very durable as two have already popped in the seams after only ever being very gently used, so that's very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: maggi

customer_reviews.title: Stay away!
customer_reviews.text: These are some cheap knock offs! I have the aqua brand already and wanted 2 exact ones to take on our vacation. I ordered them way ahead of time, but they took forever to arrive. Once I opened the package, I realized it isn't even the same item!!! They are in an unbranded package. The original aqua hammock floats have netting all the way around. These do not. They feel like they are made with a cheap material and will probably pop soon. (Dollar store quality). I'm highly disappointed. I do not have time to return these and replace with the correct ones before vacation. DO NOT ADVERTISE THESE AS AQUA HAMMOCK FLOATS IF THEY ARE NOT!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Johnson

customer_reviews.title: This is not a Monterey Hammock.
customer_reviews.text: I have two Monterey Hammocks already. This is not a Monterey. It does not come in the box like the original. It is much cheaper plastic and smells awful... Buyer beware. I will never order from this dealer again. Have to give it one star or it won't post. It is actually minus 10.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie S.

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE!! NOT REAL ITEM!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased THESE BACK IN AUG. 2019 AND THEY ARE AMAZING!. I REPURCHASED 2 MORE JUST GOT THEM AND THEY DID NOT COME IN A BOX LIKE THE OTHER ONES AND THEY ARE A CHEAP REPLICA! SMELLS LIKE A BAD CHEMICAL VERY CHEAPLY MADE! DO NOT BUY NOW THEY R FAKE!!
customer_reviews.author: maeva aguero

customer_reviews.title: The company, Henanxi continues to misrepresent their product as an Aqua 4-1 Monterey pool Hammock.
customer_reviews.text: The company, Henanxi, continues to misrepresent the product in question as an Aqua 4-1 Monterey pool hammock. Not only do they use false advertising by using the Aqua brand and advertizing as their own, but they have also refused to give a full refund. First, they offered 40%, 50%, then 60%, and let me keep the cheap plastic floats. I want a full refund, but first, they want me to remove the "Awful" rating.
customer_reviews.author: L. J. Collier

customer_reviews.title: Greatest pool float ever
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a trip to Mexico after reading all of the reviews and I don’t regret it one bit. This was so easy to blow up and take to the pool with me each day. It was so comfy to lounge around in and I received so many compliments. I think it took me about 2 min total to blow up the head rest and foot rest. It stayed inflated all week. It took a couple minutes to deflate and was easy for me to pack back up to bring home. The only thing that would make this better is a cup holder
customer_reviews.author: Choo-Choo-Kitty

customer_reviews.title: and the air plugs are terribly hard to open to put in the air
customer_reviews.text: I will keep this product, but there were navy spots on the white stripes, as if the paint came off when it was in box. Looks cheap, and the air plugs are terribly hard to open to put in the air. We had to use pliers to pull it open. Don't like that the plugs are double.....one for letting in and one for letting out. And we had to make a hole in the inner one to put the air in-have to use a air pump. Very disappointed. in manufacturing of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I loved this float
customer_reviews.text: I loved this float! I took it with me to the pool for the first time yesterday and all of my friends tried it out and want to order one. And my husband asked me to order him one. It is perfect for me because I mostly just go to the pool to sit and relax with my friends and have a couple of drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Great but take this into account
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy it. BUT you will have ti have a good sense of balance when trying to get on it, since you can easilu be destabilized from any rough motions while also on it. But other than that the material feels heavy duty and its lasted the whole time ive had for which is probably more than a month
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Cheap imitation of Aqua Leisure 4-1 Monterey Hammock
customer_reviews.text: This item is a cheap imitation of product from Aqua Leisure Industries. I had a previously purchased this item and the pillow cushions were more of a fabric material. The one I received on this order was cheap plastic with a foul odor. I feel the company was deceptive in their advertising since they advertised a picture which looked like the other company's product. They shipped something with different packaging than they advertised with inferior quality.
customer_reviews.author: R. Naylor

customer_reviews.title: Wing it for the value.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these floats, although, they leak from the seams. I bought 5 of these and all but 1 are leaking. They're slow leaks so I'm able to use them but I have to continue to blow them up after every use. They're definitely comfortable, great colors, and definitely a better design with the mesh than the traditional blow up floats. They also don't blow out of the pool on windy days.
customer_reviews.author: Feeney

customer_reviews.title: Awesome float!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING PRODUCT!!! We bought this for our trip to Jamaica. Not only is it super comfortable (you can sit/lie in it so many ways), but it is VERY easy to pack because it deflates flat. They are a little hard to blow up, but other than that excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love this pool float
customer_reviews.text: Love Love Love this pool float!!!! So many different ways to use it. Very comfortable to float on. I have recommended it to a number of my friends. If it is in stock, get one!
customer_reviews.author: Gaylynn

customer_reviews.title: Makes your skin purple
customer_reviews.text: I used this for the first time and it turned my neck and back purple like I had bruises. Thankfully it washed off after scrubbing. I was wearing sunscreen. I don't know if that is what caused the color on the float to come off onto my skin. I imagine most people using this would be wearing sunscreen. I got this purposely for vacation, and am very disappointed that I won't have a float. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Beach Walker

customer_reviews.title: Really AQUA product?
customer_reviews.text: My “Aqua” XL hammocks were delivered today after a few weeks. The package was nondescript and tossed in my front lawn. They arrived without any indication of being an actual AQUA product... no box, no labels, no return address or invoice. The time delay in delivery and arriving in cheap plastic wrap leads me to believe these aren’t of any quality besides a cheap product of China. I ordered based on trying this product at another pool but not doing enough research of where the other person ordered from. I am hoping they last a season but it’s not worth sending back.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli J. Slager

customer_reviews.title: We love it and have recommended this to friends!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the 2-person pool hammock. It's fantastic! We used it in Cabo, our local pool and our lake. This means that so far it's been blown up (easy to do) and taken down multiple times. In Cabo we let kids play in it, and at times there were 3-4 kids in there splashing around and having a blast! The only damage it's taken is a few mesh snags. It worked well for both one and two people. One gentleman in Cabo tried it with his wife, and he was 6'8" and nearly 300 lbs. It kept them both afloat and comfortable. After trying it they bought one right away for their pool. I'm glad I found this!
customer_reviews.author: Finley B

customer_reviews.title: Mom's Floatie!  (hands off)  LOVING this!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have a variety of floaties for our pool (hint: buy them at the end of the season for a fraction of the cost and you are all set for next year), and did we need another one? Not really, but am I glad that I purchased this! This is my floatie (my husband and kids have been warned!) and it is amazing! What is so great is that my head and feet are on the pillows and my body is in the water, so I stay cool and get to relax. There are various ways to use this, but I found my preferred spot, and yes, it is wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Deana E.

customer_reviews.title: I LOVED this thing
customer_reviews.text: I LOVED this thing! I brought it to Cancun 🍹 and sat in it whole time in the pool, even though the resort had floats this was much more comfortable and versatile with using it different ways. Takes little space in luggage bag and really quick to inflate and deflate. I just ordered an extra one.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Knockoff
customer_reviews.text: This is a cheap knockoff and is not as advertised as in the description. The material is your cheap plastic pool float, even though it is advertised and photographed as having a premium fabric. It doesn't come with the free tote as advertised. Further, when I contacted the seller regarding this, they initially offered me a 25% refund, followed by a 60% refund. They never took ownership of the fact they were selling fraudulent knockoffs. Thankful for Amazon making things right!
customer_reviews.author: FL Hart

customer_reviews.title: Great pool float!
customer_reviews.text: This pool float is awesome! Easy to inflate (just a few breaths into the pillow on either side and you're good to go) and really comfortable!! The plastic pillows are covered with durable fabric so you don't stick to the pillows and you don't get burned when it's been out in the sun for a bit. The mesh keeps you cool as it allows the water to touch you and you can float around forever! My kids love it too - easy to get on and lots of different options as to how to use it. I'm buying 3 more for the family!
customer_reviews.author: Momof2

customer_reviews.title: Piece of Junk
customer_reviews.text: This float was a piece of junk. I didn't notice until 5 minutes after putting it in the water, it had two identical holes in the mesh area between the pillows. In addition, the pillows leaked air so they didn't function as promised. Overall, this was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Partyplanner

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I absolutely LOVE this float!! I purchased the XL for my husband and the regular size for myself. The XL states max 250 lbs. - my husband is around 270 lbs. and it works perfect for him! Easy to inflate, easy to store, and seems pretty durable. One other lady at our pool asked us where we purchased these because she wanted one too! They are so comfortable! I use mine mostly with the “chair” and “lounge” position. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t inflate it, the plugs were sealed when opened. It was awful to inflate.
customer_reviews.text: I had to leave this float behind because I couldn’t inflate it. The plugs were completely sealed when opened all the way so no air would pass. I finally punctured the interior of the plugs with a knife and of course in my frustration punctured one side of the float. I was able to inflate the undamaged side after puncturing it and the float seemed like it would have been very nice. I believe it was defective. I left the float behind. I want something of this style but am afraid to order again and waste my money.
customer_reviews.author: VC

customer_reviews.title: A decent product, but not sure it's worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: The product is fine, but it's too much for what you're getting. Just to be clear, its two inflatable tubes connected by some netting. You can get a lot more for a lot less at a dollar store. Additionally, I'm 6'2 and if I put one tube under my neck, the other is under my lower back/butt. Not the most comfortable in that position. My wife is 5'8 and it also doesn't really fit her under the knees either...so I gather this is made for very short people. We all do enjoy the "saddle" position using this, though. Product seems relatively durable.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Not Aqua floats; misrepresented item
customer_reviews.text: These arrived 2+ weeks after being ordered. There are no brand markings anywhere on the packages. Completely different than what is advertised as an Aqua brand box with a raft inside. I messaged seller and they stated Id have to pay return international shipping (which is against Amazon policy) or they would give me 20% off to keep the floats. These packages give off a very strong plastic scent and feel extremely cheap. Do not waste your time ordering. If you are dissatisfied with your order expect major hurdles and time spent to resolve.
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, easy to transport float
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy it is to inflate on the spot. It can be folded quite small for easy transport in a bag for a lake day. I have since bought two more (a two person one and another one person one). It is really comfortable to sit in and allows for most of my body to be submerged. I don't quite know the weight capacity; if my husband tried to sit in it I don't know how high his head would be out of the water but I love this product and have recommended to all of my friends. It only takes about 8 breaths per side to blow up.
customer_reviews.author: swmmer608

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made, come with two plastic syringes, not pictured on the post, for filling with air (which would have been a good clue). Ballasts are just cheap vinyl and if you get a hole, it and you are going down. I expected something floatable made entirely out of fabric. Not what I wanted or expected. Return postage required to China which is not worth it. These are going in the trash, money wasted, lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pool accessory.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic pool float. You can sit between the inflatables or lay back and use it like a hammock. Very comfortable!! It rolls up to take up almost no room for storage. Wish I had ordered more than one because everyone has been fighting for the one we have. Will be getting another one.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Vaughan

customer_reviews.title: Stoppers make the difference!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these in July for our trip to Mexico this week. I bought two identical floats however you can see from the stopper they are different. The first pic shows a large hole that was easy to blow up and deflate. The other was a nightmare to inflate and deflate. I wish I would have checked this when I bought it so I could have sent it back. The float is beautiful and very comfortable..
customer_reviews.author: CRYSTAL RENNER

customer_reviews.title: Fun in the Sun
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to take to a shore trip and wasn't sure if it would really work holding 2 people without sagging. It worked fantastically! The raft added to our fun vacation for sure! We used it every day in the water and had no problems deflating or sagging. I would suggest when inflating it to use a bike pump ... it makes it easier and faster to inflate. I can't comment on doing it manually, as I didn't bother to try. The bike pump had the raft inflated in seconds and off we went into the ocean. By the way: It definitely held 2 Adults who carry a good weight on them and no problems whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great idea terrible air valves
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a great idea- very portable and versatile....but air valves are awful! To inflate you have to try and keep the air in the pillows while trying to cap the valve. I tried many times and the most air I could keep in the pillows was half filled. Then I tried to remove the caps from the valves and they will not come out. If they would use the proper valves then I could highly recommend this product! Returning!
customer_reviews.author: ELIZABETH

customer_reviews.title: Either sent the wrong item or XL is no different than the regular size
customer_reviews.text: I have this float in the regular size for me and its perfect as I am only 5'5". My husband is 6'2" so I ordered the XL for him. The product description says the XL float should be 53" x 33" but the one I received is 50" x 27" when laid flat which means it will be even smaller when inflated. It also didn't come with a box, just folded in a cheap cellophane sleeve. I was either sent the wrong size or the measurements in the product description are inaccurate. Either way I am disappointed as this size is about the same as my regular float and isn't going to work for my husband.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica N.

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit and easy to store
customer_reviews.text: Why in the world did we ever fight with those skinny mattress floats? They are hard to get on & off, hard to blow up, stuck to your skin, leaked... did I miss anything? This design replicates the Zero Gravity position. It also allows you to be in the water, not baking on top and trying to splash yourself every 10min. I also bought a sitting floater for comparison, which has it's benefits, like being able to read sitting upright. But for relaxing, I prefer this design and it's just as easy to sit up by swinging your legs down. You won't regret this purchase. Easy to blow up & get in. Simple and Fun.
customer_reviews.author: A Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, flexible little floats
customer_reviews.text: I bought four of these a year ago and have been so pleased with them. Super comfortable to lounge or sit on. There are multiple ways to use them--two ways to sit and a full lay-back lounge position. These work well in all positions. I have a very small pool (an Endless Pool, only 7X16) and these were the perfect solution for letting a lot of people bob around together without eating up all the pool space with rafts. Everyone universally loves using them. They are so small that I even stored them this winter without releasing the air. Went right back into the pool this spring. Thanks for making such a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Jane C

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the pool
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely enjoy my pool float in light blue an white. Comfortable, easy to inflate and I stay in the pool water for hours with this float. People are always asking me where I found this float... My advice: Get two. You never know when you take a guest to the pool and need a 2nd float. The price is good for the durability of this float and you will get your monies worth.
customer_reviews.author: Celestial  Seeker

customer_reviews.title: Very cool, minimalist float
customer_reviews.text: I got this for myself to use in our small pool. I wanted something that wouldn't take up a lot of extra space in the pool or while being stored. This float fits those requirements perfectly! Thinking about buying a few more to replace some of the more bulky floats we currently have. I like how it can but used in different positions. I enjoy sitting in it or laying back to get some sun. It is a little tricky when laying back on it sometimes. It is also easy for others to flip you. I could see the netting possibly getting stretched over time. Overall, a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: RebelRoze

customer_reviews.title: Chinese knockoff. Not a real Aqua and not what is described
customer_reviews.text: This is not a real Aqua float. It is packaged and of quality of a dollar store item. Cheap quality plastic materials. I am returning. Please read the many reviews like mine before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Dale

customer_reviews.title: a good accessory for the pool
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I bought this. I think its best to lay on it--calling it a 4-in-1 is a bit of hyperbole, IMO. But it's comfortable enough with the head on one end and the knees draped over the other. IMO, helpful to have an inflating machine to get the air in it--and that's easy (blowing air into it is not). Holds air better than some similar devices we've had in the past. Haven't tested the durability of it (the test of that will be when the dog stops being afraid of it, and swipes her nails against it while I'm on it--I'm not expecting the device to survive that test).
customer_reviews.author: Robert J

customer_reviews.title: The Only Pool Accessory That You Will Ever Need
customer_reviews.text: I purchased several different types of floaties for the pool, and this has been the favorite among all our guests. Everyone fights over this one, it is that good. The pillow and leg rest inflate very easily and quickly with a pump, and they both stay inflated with no leakage. The hammock part is the best part because it dips your body into the water to keep you cool. I have also straddled the middle section to sit up, and it keeps me from sinking. This is the best way to lounge in your swimming pool this summer, folks! And the price is right!!!
customer_reviews.author: LV4NMLSTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Buy these. Best pool floats ever
customer_reviews.text: The best part is how easy these are to inflate and deflate! I HATE pool floats that take forever to blow up. You don’t even need a pump with these to blow them up. My boyfriend blew his up in about 3 big breaths. Also super easy and fast to deflate and fold up in a beach bag to take home. These are the most versatile pool floats I have ever seen. You have so many options and with all of them you still get to be mostly in the water so you stay cool! The material seems surprisingly durable even the mesh. LOVE LOVE LOVE. I want to buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Ape

customer_reviews.title: Love it, a must have for beach trips
customer_reviews.text: It took forever to be shipped but the quality seems better than a similar product I bought and lasted only a few uses. This one seems better quality, specially the inflatable part. I love this floatie because I can take it to all my beach trips and it's so easy and lightweight to pack in a carry on. Also, because it's like a hammock most of the time your body core is submerged in water, only problem your knees can get sunburnt, but well, just be careful and put an alarm if you fall sleep on this hammock, which I usually do, that's why I love it!
customer_reviews.author: nina1984

customer_reviews.title: Lasted over a year!
customer_reviews.text: I got this last summer because I liked that it would keep my body in the water on the really hot days. It has gotten a little dingy but other than that it still works like new! I like that it is easy to blow up - great for throwing in the car for the beach as it does not take up much room and is easy to store by draping it over the side of my ATG pool. My only complaint would be that it will only hold adults up to a certain weight. Good for me but won't hold up my larger husband or our grown weightlifting boys. Definitely has been worth its money for me though!
customer_reviews.author: Kcuret

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: We set up a stock tank pool this summer, and so we don't have a ton of room in it for pool toys and accessories. I was pleased to find this because it works just as well as full pool float but takes up a fraction of the space. And when we are not using it, it folds up and doesn't interfere with the pool filter. Quick and easy to inflate, and so far it seems plenty sturdy. I like the mesh rather than plastic as well - it's much cooler and less sticky than a traditional pool float. Very easy to recommend, especially for the price. We will be getting another.
customer_reviews.author: That One Lady

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for our beach trip since it had good reviews and was easy to pack. I am an average size woman and based on reviews I figured it would hold up fine. It was easy to inflate and my small 10 year old daughter decided she wanted to float on it first. After one float the entire side was ripped and no longer usable. It was a complete waste of money, we ended up throwing it in the trash can before leaving the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Dykstra

customer_reviews.title: The PERFECT float
customer_reviews.text: I rave about this float to everyone! Pros: Deflates into a small bag, comfortable in any seated or reclined position, compact and does not take up a lot of space when it is inflated, nothing scratchy. Cons: There's a bit of a learning curve to inflate it. Don't pull the inflatables completely out of the enclosure. Just pull them out enough to get to the plug. Shove 'em in and make sure the velcro is lined up so you don't have any exposed to possibly snag your suit on. if you have a boat or a pool, YOU NEED THIS FLOATIE!
customer_reviews.author: Sara K.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for floating and reading!
customer_reviews.text: This float is amazing! I like to float and read my Paperwhite in the pool, and this allows me to either lie back to tan or sit up with my arms resting on the front pillow while the back on supports me. It's super simple to get on and off of and didn't take forever to blow up like the bigger floats do. We took them to the beach, and they were fun there, too. We just straddled them and used them as seats so we could talk, and it was great. The color is fading a little after a few months, but I'm in Florida. Everything fades.
customer_reviews.author: Tegan M

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This floatie is awesome! I thought I would sit lower in the water, but was pleasantly surprised by how supportive it is. It's so comfortable to lay in that my friend bought one too. I wanted the pink, which is the cheapest for some reason, but it would be nice to be able to get other colors for the same price. I have one little hole in the netting already, but we've had some crazy weather and I keep it outside, so that's probably on me. I'm 5'7" and I lay comfortable with one support under my neck/head, and the other right at the back of my knees.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clever, Great For Traveling & Easy Storage
customer_reviews.text: This is a very clever idea for a float that you can store easily. It’s not my favorite choice but it works! My husband is tired of storing pool items that take up a lot of space during the “off” season. You can sit on this, lay on your back just like it says. Four stars because you can’t really lay on your stomach the way you can on your back...since your knees don’t bend backwards, you can’t really get them on the back pillow. Well, at least I can’t! I would totally recommend for traveling or if you don’t want to store large pool items!
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie

customer_reviews.title: FAKE PRODUCT!!!! NOT AQUA!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fake product from a Chinese website that took WEEKS to get here, only for me to realize it is not even what was advertised. Of course they don't accept refunds but I am going to report this to Amazon as much as I can. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: kate

customer_reviews.title: Was skeptical, but now I’m sold!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first because I wanted pool floats at a reasonable price. So of course I had to align my expectations with that. However, I couldn’t have been more pleasantly surprised. They are awesome! It’s so nice that you can use it to float in many different ways. Not sure how many people use the traditional out of the water float anymore so this is really functional. Also, I really appreciated that it doesn’t take up a ton of room to store. I was able to put 4 of these in a deck box no problem. They were used all summer long with nothing but compliments. Thanks for the great value product. Couldn’t be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time with third party seller...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased from a third party seller. The item was nothing like pictured. I would compare it to a dollar tree float. Save yourself the hassle and order prime.
customer_reviews.author: Pegasus

customer_reviews.title: Awesome float!
customer_reviews.text: Love this float. It is really comfy, even if your short (I'm 5' 0"). Might be the most comfortable float I've used. It isn't the most ideal for sun tanning; but just to sit back and relax, it's awesome...especially on super hot days, since it allows a lot of your body to be in the water. It has stayed inflated, no issues there. Def worth the price. One complaint is that I ordered Orange, and they sent me Light Blue. But, it wasn't worth the time and effort to exchange it, I'll live with the color just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jessi D.

customer_reviews.title: 2 different suppliers
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this item at the beginning of summer and a 2nd time in the middle of summer. The first batch was great. Sturdy material and easy to inflate; a great float for the boat. The second time we ordered took 3 times as long to receive and was inferior quality. So depending on what item you actually receive, it'll be money well spent for floaties or a short term floatie that won't last to next season.
customer_reviews.author: cwehri

customer_reviews.title: For the price, its A-OK
customer_reviews.text: After sweating profusely working in the yard, my husband and I floated around on these in the pool. We both fit comfortably. I'm 5'3 and well, a woman never divulges her weight but it held me well. He's 5 9 and over 200 lbs. It held him well. It was nice. It'll be interesting to see how long these last--durability. We don't have small kids and the grandkids are all grown, so no one here to jump around on them. I blew it up easily with a held held air pump, took 17 small pushes. Worth a try for the price.
customer_reviews.author: BamasLuLu

customer_reviews.title: Not the real Auqua brand. Cheap knockoffs.
customer_reviews.text: Not the authentic brand that is pictured. See my pictures. The real Auqua brand comes in a printed box not a Cheap China bag with no information on it.
customer_reviews.author: BQ

customer_reviews.title: Underwhelmed
customer_reviews.text: The only reason this float is ok is because it’s easily portable and easily inflated. Idk why, but it’s just not comfortable for me. I’m 5’2” and maybe it’s too long. I feel like I’m going to drown or flip over. Probably great for laying in a still pool, but I took it to the lake and pretty much was underwater any time a boat drove by and left a small wave. Definitely can’t hold a drink and lounge on this. I also had to wait a weirdly long time to get this. Just underwhelmed by this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M Foley

customer_reviews.title: Easy to inflate
customer_reviews.text: I love these rafts. It doesn't take much to inflate or deflate and there are several ways to lay or sit on them. I have one that is about 4 years old and still hanging in there. Not a complaint but I noticed that my old one had a more adaptable plug than this model. The one I just purchased just has the normal small blowup valve but the older model also had a quick deflate plug you could pull. Not a big deal considering it is small enough to easily blow up with just your mouth. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: GARY F

customer_reviews.title: So this is what it’s like to float!
customer_reviews.text: GAME CHANGER!!! Having trouble understanding the pleasure of floating while basking in the sun? Look no further. This swim accessory gently supports your backside while raising your knees and head out of the water. The Head rest air pillow Raises you up enough that water doesn’t splash in your ears but still allows your arms to comfortably float in the cool water. I’m the words of my 75 year old father “This is that it feels like to float! No wonder your mother loved doing this!” The air leaks out if the nozzle is pushed into the pillow but it’s fine if it sticks out.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Scholl

customer_reviews.title: Beware if you buy from seller Assanic!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could write two reviews! I bought one of the deluxe hammocs from Amazon, and loved it so much I bought another. High-quality, awesome product. The second one I received is a cheap, flimsy knock off sold from seller Assanic. Nothing like the original that I purchased. Lesson learned! Make sure you’re buying from Amazon as the seller.
customer_reviews.author: OT in CT

customer_reviews.title: Similar product, but not the brand pictured
customer_reviews.text: Of the gazillion things that I've bought from Amazon, this was the first that made me say, "Hmmm." The Aqua Monterrey 4-in-1 pool float is a particular branded product. That is NOT what I received, as is obvious from my photo. It has a similar look and is a similar product, but it is definitely NOT the brand represented. It is a float and it works -- and it was inexpensive, so I can't complain too much -- but I have no idea how the quality compares to the actual product that I thought I was buying. Caveat emptor if purchasing from the seller Henanxi.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Good, small float
customer_reviews.text: We ordered three different floats for our above-ground pool, and this one is my favorite. I like that you can relax in it like a hammock, and it's got the back float to serve like a pillow, and I like that you can straddle it and lean on the front float too. Pretty easy contraption that works well and keeps me afloat and doesn't take as much space as some of the other floats. . The color is a nice bright turquoise. We're happy with it. My husband likes it too and it holds him up well.
customer_reviews.author: Afemat

customer_reviews.title: So comfy
customer_reviews.text: Love sitting in the middle of this and using (what would be head and foot if used as a raft) the stripped part like arm rests. It's very easy to get on and off of. You are submerged to about lower chest which keeps you nice and cool, yet your legs are free to move them around and get a bit of exercise. Very easy to maneuver yourself around the pool unlike a raft, where just go where the raft takes you. However, it can also be used as a raft, if you prefer to lay back. The whole family likes this one.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: just get one!- DELUXE model
customer_reviews.text: I love this float! I love that the 2 blow ups are removable and the handle. I actually put snaps on sides if mine so when you remove the blow ups and fold it in have it becomes a beach bag! Super easy to inflate and deflate and great to travel with! My pool pals bought cheaper versions and are very jelly of mine! However, for the removable blowups , handle and canvas you have to make sure you order the DELUXE model in navy/green. The other models are not canvas covered, no handle and not machine washable.
customer_reviews.author: Bonni L Mackin

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted those floating hammocks or super soft pool floats that stay above water and are about $100-190. I purchased this item instead and love it. It works great as a hammock that keeps my body under water but my head and feet above. I also used it as a drifter and worked my legs and gluts just doing kicks back and forth in the pool. I got this for about $15 and its my favorite pool float and the easiest to put away and store as most of it is a mesh cloth. I give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: JoeSacramento

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit product from China. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: This is not the Aqua 4 in 1 brand that is pictured that we have used before. We received a counterfeit product from seller "Henanxi" that is from China that is cheap plastic. Will not even inflate this to use in the water with our family. Will be contacting Amazon immediately.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Worth it all tacos considered
customer_reviews.text: It’s a fun float, but hard to do what the picture shows. It’s easier to sit sideways and put the floats under your arms. If you lay lengthwise, your tush naturally sinks, so your knees come up and next thing you know, yours some sort of striped taco flailing in the middle of a pool. Or so I’ve heard.
customer_reviews.author: Briscomes

customer_reviews.title: Deflated with barely any use.
customer_reviews.text: This float is actually really awesome because it fit myself and my husband and it was awesome floating around together especially since we brought it on vacation and it was pretty easy to inflate except for closing it. But after using it for only 2 days for maybe 2 hours at most...one side of it was staying deflated & we were very careful with it. If it hadn’t deflated this would have been pretty awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Josie

customer_reviews.title: Does Exactly What it's Supposed To
customer_reviews.text: This is a cool little hammock float. We can use it sideways, or straighten out and put our knees over the pillow. I've found that it does leave a print, from the hammock material, on your skin when you sit on it, but it's not a big deal. I mean, it goes away after you are off of it. And really who cares? The price is right, it works well, and I think the indents are kind of cool. My butt looks like a waffle. Ha. Coolness. Seriously though, buy it. You will like it.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Cheap crap.  I mean Dollar Tree cheap crap.  Amazon you need a better handle on your vendors.
customer_reviews.text: This was so disappointing. I ordered 2 from a different vendor and excellent. This one went directly into the trash. Dollar Tree has better merchandise than this. Such a crappy product. I’ll never order from this vendor again.
customer_reviews.author: Judi Watson

customer_reviews.title: Best Portable Pool Float For Travel or Home!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for a vacation in the Dominican Republic. They packed easy, inflated easy, deflated easy, dried quickly and fit right back in my suitcase. These are hands down worth the extra money. We’ve gone through several cheaper products and they tear, deflate, irritate your skin, not balanced right — they got everything right on this thing! The fabric is high quality. Takes maybe 30 seconds to blow up with air from your Lungs (no pump required.). I think the only thing they could add to make it better is a cup holder! :) We thought we’d just use these for travel initially but liked them so much we will use during summer in our own pool.
customer_reviews.author: wisc75

customer_reviews.title: This is not just a float.
customer_reviews.text: I blew this thing up, floated in a lake, loved it. Was gonna rate it highly, but WAIT. My aunt bought that $200 monstrosity of a float/boat/island of a blow up toy. We tried to hang on it, but because it was so large, we were getting bit by flies. I wrapped this beautiful mesh baby around myself and it served as a wonderful bug net. I highly reccomend this to anyone who loves to float and who hates bugs.
customer_reviews.author: Meaghan O'Shaughnessy

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!!!  These are not Aqua brand as stated.
customer_reviews.text: These are not Aqua brand Monterey Hammock, as the ad states. They are a cheap vinyl knockoff from China. They came in a bag, not a box as pictured. Also, the pillows are made of cheap vinyl instead of the canvas that Aqua uses. The product received was hot pink instead of the burgundy they were supposed to be. It will now cost me money to return the cheap items that I didn’t want. I would give it zero stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little float!
customer_reviews.text: This float is as good as the many reviews on it! Love that I can use it in multiple ways, that it’s super easy and fast to inflate (equivalent to blowing up a balloon or two.). The one negative is that in the reclined position it lays you back, so not ideal for having a conversation while looking at someone, but a great float nonetheless and one I’ll take with me on vacations. Also, takes nearly no room to store compared to most others.
customer_reviews.author: atbluebonnet

customer_reviews.title: Easy to blow up and store away.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these floats for how easy they are to blow up, to store away and also how comfy they are. I like to be able to flip over on my stomach and just can’t do that with these which is why I didn’t give it 5 stars. Just know this is a float for your back and not your front. Also, be very cautious with children because they can get hung up on it when it’s floating freely. I like to keep it out of the pool unless someone is using it.
customer_reviews.author: Healthy Oiling Mama

customer_reviews.title: Great Pool Floatie!
customer_reviews.text: The house we rented at the beach had one of these at their pool and I practically lived on it for an entire week! it is so comfy and versatile. you can sit or lay on it! I like to read in the pool so i would sit in the mesh part and prop myself up to read, and it worked great! I loved it so much that i ended up coming home and purchasing two for us to use at our community pool. So many people have asked me where to get one, they love it as well!
customer_reviews.author: patambe21

customer_reviews.title: Nice float!
customer_reviews.text: Just used it for the first time, and I'd have to say this is my favorite pool float I've ever used. Very easy to inflate, store, carry, and get into. It's just a smart, simple design. You're definitely mostly in the water in this thing, so if you're in a place where the water is too cold to really be comfortable, it wouldn't work well. If the water is a nice temperature, this thing seems perfect! If my conclusions change after using it a few more times, I'll update this review.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: It’s horribly cheap
customer_reviews.text: This IS NOT by Aqua, it’s cheap Chinese knock-off. The worst item I have ever purchased on Amazon and that’s saying something. Boooooo
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware - only but if the vendor is Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these back in July and lived it. Good materials, comfy! I bought three more when they went on sale - not the same product. The packaging was different -two just came in plastic bags. The materials are cheap and they are a little smaller. This was supposed to be an XL was smaller than the regular sized real product. DO NOT BUY unless sold through Amazon. The other vendors will send you cheap crap directly from China.
customer_reviews.author: nrmclaren

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, comfy swim float
customer_reviews.text: The raft is good quality and easy to blow up without needing an air pump. The fabric for the floats or pillows are very nice and the edges of the hammock portion are edged with fabric. I feel the word hammock is deceiving as this is NOT a full length raft. When laying on the raft with your head on one end, the other end will only reach behind your knees. I’d love to see them offer a full length option. It takes very little room to store so we love it for our boat.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine C. Ternes

customer_reviews.title: Great simple float
customer_reviews.text: I love this float. It doesn't completely replace a traditional float as there is no good way to lay on your stomach on this one, but it is great for what it's meant for - either laying on your back or sitting in it as a hammock. It allows the right amount of your body to be in the water while keep you afloat. Super easy to blow up and seems to be high quality. Liked the first one so much, I bought a second. Another thing I liked is that they are easy to store - you don't have to necessarily deflate them to store them because they don't take up much space even when inflated.
customer_reviews.author: E. Wrye

customer_reviews.title: We gave this as a gift
customer_reviews.text: I own a smaller one, but definitely not as nice as this one. The head/foot blow up inserts are separate from the outer mesh liner, which is nice if you spring a leak. We gave it as a gift to someone at our condo pool. He loves it. In fact, he loves it so much, he's used it every day since it arrived! Another surprise was, Amazon said it would be delivered yesterday (Thursday) yet it arrived on Tuesday, 2 days early! Worth EVERY penny!
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor Rose Godfrey

customer_reviews.title: best purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: I bought this floaty to bring to Cuba, it was the best thing I ever did. If I wasn't using it, someone from my group would borrow it. so many ways to use it and easy to carry around with you on the resort. it came in a tiny box, I opened it at home to make sure there were no holes before leaving. deflated it and folded it nicely in my luggage. I will be bringing this with me on all my trips, all my friends want to get some for our next holiday.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Knock Off
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased many of these and they are usually awesome but I just received two cheap knock off copies. They are not as advertised “Thicker material than most other pool floats;” but cheap plastic like dollar store floats! Very disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable! Rolls up small for simple storage, portable
customer_reviews.text: This is a solution to the deflated float problem (two tubular chambers are very heavy-duty and unlikely to leak) and the can't-afford-the-foam-float problem. I was worried my head would be tipped backwards or otherwise not supported, but that is NOT the case at all, and this is very comfortable. I'm well supported and my body is still in the water to keep cool. Going to get more to give to my sister, who leaves her floats inflated and has trouble storing them during the summer months. These inflate/deflate quickly and store in a very small space.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Begley

customer_reviews.title: VERY Cheap, Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Target had a great float that looked exactly like this, but was much better quality and the net was removable from the actual floating parts. This was a huge let down. It is one piece, all heat sealed together, very poorly. Won't hold air and is just a joke! It is a knock off product with an odd photo on the front. DO NOT BUY UNLESS YOU WANT SOMETHING FAKE AND CHEAP. I should have purchased from Target when I had the chance.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Ah.Maz.Ing. Okay so.... I'm larger than the average bear. 6 feet tall....300ish pounds. I wanted a float for the lazy river that would be comfortable because those tubes..... aren't. So I bought this and I love it. I thought it might not hold me.... or might not float because... you know.... but it does and it does and it's awesome. I just want to float around all day. Too bad the lazy river doesn't flow to the office.
customer_reviews.author: N. Silver

customer_reviews.title: Great as a lounger.
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I purchased two of these for me as I work outdoors at a pool every day. I wanted to sit on the mesh like a saddle and ride it as I went about my duties in the pool with residents. It is SUPER uncomfortable that way. The mesh digs into your thighs in a most not nice manner. It was surprisingly tippy this way as well. Sitting on it like a sling chair didn’t work for me either. As a lounger, it’s great, but I cannot be laying about whilst on the clock. For my purposes, I’ll be sticking to dollar store pool noodles, but for lounging, my daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa W

customer_reviews.title: Great pool float - can be used so many ways!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, these are great little pool floats. Liked them so much, I bought three different colors. They are easy to inflate, easy to deflate, don't take up a lot of room when storing, not heavy or bulky, and you can use them in so many different ways. If you want to relax and lounge around the pool, lay back and use in the hammock position. To sit up and enjoy the water or conversation, use the saddle or chair position. I don't know if they will hold up for several seasons, but for the price, does it matter?! Honestly though, so far, so good! Happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bubblygirl

customer_reviews.title: Great float for travel
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect floats for vacation. Easy to inflate/deflate, fold up small to fit in luggage, sturdy, and can keep you floating in many different positions. I preferred laying on mine with one support under neck and the other under legs. My boyfriend often sat in his and put his legs up on mine and it still held the buoyancy. I will use these for the rest of summer and travel with them in the future.
customer_reviews.author: LD13

customer_reviews.title: easy to inflate and store but came with a dime size hole in the mesh
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a wonderful product, except mine arrived with a tear in it about the size of a dime in the mesh. It doesn’t seem to affect the performance but I’m not sure if it will hold up very long. I’m thinking about getting a replacement or possibly just sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Callie

customer_reviews.title: Made for a child
customer_reviews.text: I am 5' 6" and I can not use this float to lay on as it is pictured. I was so excited to receive this float. I inflated it and immediately got in the pool with it. Unfortunately, I can only sit in it side to side. I can not use it as pictured because the length barely even goes to my bottom. It is not comfortable at all. I requested a return, but the company is insisting that I pay for return postage.
customer_reviews.author: missylissac

product_meta.title: Aqua 4-in-1 Monterey Hammock Inflatable Pool Float, Multi-Purpose Pool Hammock (Saddle, Lounge Chair, Hammock, Drifter) Pool Chair, Portable Water Hammock, Navy/White Stripe
product_meta.description:
Color:Blue Navy

Color: Blue Navy 

Relax or workout. The Monterey boasts a 4-in-1 inflatable float system: hammock, lounge chair, exercise saddle, and Drifter. The Multi-purpose lounge quickly converts for relaxation, socializing, and even exercise in the pool. Lounge features comfortable cool weave fabric and folds easily for portability. Easily inflate and deflate with duo lock inflation system. The Monterey inflatable float system is a great addition to the summer pool this season and delivers fun so you can socialize, relax and even exercise. 

-Versatile: Monterey 4-in-1 Hammock offers 4 unique positions! Hammock, lounge chair, drifter and exercise saddle. Great for free-motion water (aerobics) exercise. 

-Recline-Relax-Dream: Supportive mesh lining keeps you cool as you relax on the water’s surface. 

-#1 Customer Comment: “Easiest pool float to get on and get off of while in the water.” 

-Perfect Size: 44” x 28” (112 cm x 71 cm) 

-Ages 15 and up; Weight Capacity 250 lbs. 

WARNING: 

This is not a life-saving device. NEVER leave children unattended while device is in use. Use only under competent supervision. Good safety practices should be followed at all times. Do not over-inflate or use high-pressure air to inflate. 

COMMITTED TO CUSTOMER SATISFACTION: 

LIMITED WARRANTY – Your satisfaction is our ultimate goal. That’s why all Aqua-Leisure products carry our performance warranty. Fabric colors may fade if frequently used in high chlorine-salt-bromine chemically treated pool water or ocean-water. More importantly, commercial pools are much higher in chlorine, salt and bromine levels than your average home residential pool. Product color and graphics may vary from those pictured. For warranty service or more information, email Aqua-Leisure Industries, Inc. at customercare@aqualeisure.com.
feature_bullets: EASIEST POOL FLOAT to GET ON OR OFF: Seat rests in water--no jumping, no ladders, no flopping
THE MOST VERSATILE POOL FLOAT: 4-in-1 Design Converts to a Hammock, Chair, Drifter, or Exercise Saddle; US Patent No. 10011330
WATER HAMMOCK: Great in pool float, lake float, ocean float; Best for people 4’ to 6’ tall
EZ ON-OFF POOL FLOAT: Great for Seniors and Expectant Moms
SUPERIOR BOUYANCY: Thicker material than most other pool floats; Comfortably suspends you in the water and contours comfortably to your desired floating position
#1 CUSTOMER COMMENT: “Easiest pool float to get on and get off of while in the water.”
DIMENSIONS: 44” x 28” (112 cm x 71 cm); AGES 15+ and up. Weight Capacity 250 Lbs.
PACK 'N GO DESIGN: Compact and quick to inflate. Perfect for a day at the pool or a week away on vacation

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars20,070 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
